subject:

body:
At file:///home/jelmer/bzr.samba/SAMBA_4_0/

revno: 12006
revision-id: jelmer@samba.org-20070425151746-6ec8xjppsthhia0h
parent: svn-v2:22517@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0
committer: Jelmer Vernooij 
branch nick: SAMBA_4_0
timestamp: Wed 2007-04-25 17:17:46 +0200
message:
  Create pkgconfig dir.
modified:
  source/lib/talloc/Makefile.in  svn-v2:6474@0c0555d6-39d7-0310-84fc-f1cc0bd64818-branches%2fSAMBA_4_0-source%2flib%2ftalloc%2fMakefile.in
=== modified file 'source/lib/talloc/Makefile.in'
--- a/source/lib/talloc/Makefile.in	2007-04-25 13:31:38 +0000
+++ b/source/lib/talloc/Makefile.in	2007-04-25 15:17:46 +0000
@@ -35,6 +35,7 @@
 
 install: all 
 	${INSTALLCMD} -d $(DESTDIR)${libdir}
+	${INSTALLCMD} -d $(DESTDIR)${libdir}/pkgconfig
 	${INSTALLCMD} -m 755 libtalloc.a $(DESTDIR)$(libdir)
 	${INSTALLCMD} -d $(DESTDIR)${includedir}
 	${INSTALLCMD} -m 644 $(srcdir)/talloc.h $(DESTDIR)$(includedir)
